title: VC Associate's Deep Dive: Structured Research & Gap Analysis with Relativity
i_want: to conduct complex market and technical due diligence using AI
so_that: Relativity automatically structures my scattered LLM conversations into a single, living Issue Tree, ensuring I identify and address all critical investment points before the partner meeting.

acceptance_criteria.given: I start a new conversation about an investment decision
acceptance_criteria.when: I type a high-level goal ('I want to make an investment decision on this AI SaaS')
acceptance_criteria.then: A root node ('◉ Investment Decision') automatically appears in the right pane.

acceptance_criteria.given: I continue the conversation across multiple topics (Market, Tech, Team)
acceptance_criteria.then: Relativity dynamically generates an Issue Tree with branches corresponding to the discussion topics ('Market Opportunity', 'Competitive Landscape', etc.) in real-time.

acceptance_criteria.given: I am discussing a specific sub-topic deep within the tree (e.g., 'Incumbents')
acceptance_criteria.then: A visual indicator ('NOW' badge) should highlight the exact node currently under discussion.

acceptance_criteria.given: I start a new, unrelated chat thread about a detail ('Tell me more about Competitor X')
acceptance_criteria.when: Relativity recognizes the topic contextually matches an existing node in the Issue Tree ('Competition > Incumbents')
acceptance_criteria.then: It automatically links the new conversation to that existing node.

acceptance_criteria.given: I view the Issue Tree after several hours of research
acceptance_criteria.when: There are key, empty sub-nodes that have not been discussed (e.g., '○ Barriers to Entry')
acceptance_criteria.then: These empty nodes should be clearly visible, allowing me to immediately identify research gaps.

persona.name: Alice
goals: Efficiently synthesize large volumes of AI-generated research.
Ensure comprehensive due diligence without blind spots.
Present a clear, structured recommendation to partners.
pain_points: Drowning in fragmented LLM threads ('LLM Sprawl').
Wasting time re-reading and manually consolidating information.
The anxiety of potentially missing critical risk factors.

notes: The primary value is the shift from linear chat threads to a non-linear, organized thought structure. Focus on instantaneous, automatic linking and gap detection. Must handle conversations starting in different threads but linking to the same core project.
